meanings.definition: Lipids that contain a carbohydrate group
meanings.sent1: The glycolipids in the cell membrane help with cell communication.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of glycolipids in various biological processes.
meanings.sent3: The glycolipids in the lipid family always bring the sweet sugar along.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, glycolipids are like the friendly sugar-coated lipids.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the cell membrane as a sugary lipid sandwich, with glycolipids as the sweet filling.

meanings.definition: Molecules composed of a lipid and a sugar group
meanings.sent1: The glycolipids play a crucial role in maintaining cell structure.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies use glycolipids for energy storage and cell signaling.
meanings.sent3: When lipids and sugars combine, they create the magical glycolipids.
meanings.sent4: Glycolipids are like tiny lipid-sugar duos dancing together in cells.
meanings.sent5: Picture glycolipids as tiny lipid boats sailing through the sugary cell sea.
